title: FS: NEW Group of 15 Low Grade T206 w/ Demmitt St. Louis SGC A
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: NEW Group of 15 Low Grade T206 w/ Demmitt St. Louis SGC A
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards available for sale. Scans should accurately reflect the condition. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free. I accept payment via any method you prefer. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

Also, there are still lots of good deals to be had on my previous much larger groups, featuring Cobb, Young, and many SL'ers.  Please feel free to take a look at those at these links:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=176822[/url]
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=176486[/url]
